animeDescription: Nagato is a simple student who all of a sudden finds himself in deep when the most popular girl in class, his childhood friend, and an old unrequited love all confess to him at the same time! His eroge-filled youth is about to begin! (Source: hanime)
animeCharacters: [' Ayame, Amasaki', 'Kanna, Miyanoue', 'Yuri, Satogami', 'Nagato, Shinobu', 'Amelia Ren, Matsunaga']
